variant.name: OnDevice.
variant.summary: Recorded only when the compose response was evaluated on the device.

variant.name: Server.
variant.summary: Recorded only when the compose response was evaluated on the server.

histogram.name: Compose.ContextMenu.CTR
histogram.summary: Histogram for calculating the click-through rate (CTR) of the Compose context menu item. Logged each time the context menu item is displayed and when it's clicked by the user. CTR is calculated through `clicked/displayed`.

histogram.name: Compose.ContextMenu.OpenComposeDialogResult
histogram.summary: Tracks situations when the user requested to open the Compose dialog but it was impossible to do so. Recorded whenever a situation is detected that causes the dialog opening to be aborted, or when it succeeds.

histogram.name: Compose.ContextMenu.SelectedAll
histogram.summary: Histogram that records whether all text was selected on behalf of the user when opening the Compose dialog from the context menu item.

histogram.name: Compose.ContextMenu.ShowStatus
histogram.summary: Histogram that records the show status of the Compose context menu item. Logged each time the menu item is displayed or blocked from displaying (with a reason why).

histogram.name: Compose.Dialog.InnerTextNodeOffsetFound
histogram.summary: Records if a Compose request generated a valid node offset for the inner text. Logged each time the dialog is opened when the inner text response is sent to the new compose session.

histogram.name: Compose.Dialog.InnerTextShortenedBy
histogram.summary: The amount trimmed from the inner text from the page (in bytes) when the dialog is opened. The text is trimmed to inner_text_max_bytes before being sent to Compose. Logged each time the dialog is opened if the text is trimmed.

histogram.name: Compose.Dialog.InnerTextSize
histogram.summary: The size, in bytes, of the untrimmed inner text from the page when the dialog is opened. The text is trimmed to inner_text_max_bytes before being sent to Compose. Logged each time the dialog is opened.

histogram.name: Compose.Dialog.OpenLatency
histogram.summary: Time in milliseconds between triggering the Compose dialog to open and it being shown and interactable. Logged each time the dialog is shown.

histogram.name: Compose.Dialog.SelectionLength
histogram.summary: The length, in unicode code points (roughly characters), of the selection when a new Compose session is started. Recorded once per session start.

histogram.name: Compose.EntryPoint.SessionResume
histogram.summary: The entry point used to resume a Compose session. Recorded when a Compose session is resumed.

histogram.name: Compose.EntryPoint.SessionStart
histogram.summary: The entry point used to start a Compose Session. Recorded once per session start.

histogram.name: Compose.ProactiveNudge.CTR
histogram.summary: Histogram for calculating the click-through rate (CTR) of the Compose proactive nudge. Logged each time the nudge is displayed and when it's clicked by the user. CTR is calculated through `clicked/displayed`.

histogram.name: Compose.ProactiveNudge.DerivedEngagement
histogram.summary: The final derived engagement value for the nudge. Reported when the compose session ends, if the nudge was shown as a result of segmentation platform evaluation. Sessions end on insert, manual cancel, page navigation or tab destruction.

histogram.name: Compose.ProactiveNudge.ShowStatus
histogram.summary: Histogram that records the show status of the Compose proactive nudge. Segmentation Platform block reasons are recorded with the lowest priority. Logged each time the nudge is displayed or blocked from displaying (with a reason why).

histogram.name: Compose.SelectionNudge.CTR
histogram.summary: Histogram for calculating the click-through rate (CTR) of the Compose selection nudge. Logged each time the nudge is displayed and when it's clicked by the user. CTR is calculated through `clicked/displayed`.

histogram.name: Compose.Session.Duration.OverOneDay
histogram.summary: Wether or not the ComposeSession was open for more than one day. Recorded once per session when the session closes for any reason.

histogram.name: Compose.Session.EvalLocation
histogram.summary: Reports the location where the compose response was evaluated. Logged at the end of each Compose session.

histogram.name: Compose.Session.FRE.Disclaimer.CloseReason
histogram.summary: Reports the close reason for sessions where the FRE UI was shown. Recorded on session destruction only for session where the FRE dialog was shown.

histogram.name: Compose.Session.FRE.Disclaimer.DialogShownCount.{FinalStatus}
histogram.summary: Count of the number of times the Compose dialog was shown in a consent UI state where the {FinalStatus}. Recorded once per session when it is closed, destroyed, or progressed past the FRE.

histogram.name: Compose.Session.FRE.MSBB.CloseReason
histogram.summary: Reports the close reason for sessions where the MSBB UI was shown. Recorded on session destruction only for session where the MSBB dialog was shown.

histogram.name: Compose.Session.FRE.MSBB.DialogShownCount.{FinalStatus}
histogram.summary: Count of the number of times the Compose dialog was shown in a MSBB UI state where {FinalStatus}. Recorded once per session when it is closed, destroyed, or progressed past the MSBB UI.

histogram.name: Compose.TextElementUsage.LongField.EditingTime
histogram.summary: Records the time a user spends editing a long field (TextArea or contenteditable). This is the sum of time between each keystroke, up to a maximum of 5 seconds for each. Reported once per long field a user edits, once per page load.

histogram.name: Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Request.Duration.Error
Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Request.Duration.Ok
Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Request.Feedback
histogram.summary: Records the final value of feedback for each Compose Request. Logged when feedback can no longer be modified for a request. {ComposeEvalLocation}

histogram.name: Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Request.Reason

variant.summary: Logged each time a Compose request is sent. Recorded for all evaluation locations.

variant.name: OnDevice.
variant.summary: Logged each time a Compose response that was evalued on device is received.

variant.name: Server.
variant.summary: Logged each time a Compose response that was evalued on the server is received.

histogram.name: Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Request.Status
histogram.summary: Histogram for recording the Compose server request status. Logged each time a Compose request receives a response. {ComposeEvalLocation}

histogram.name: Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Request.{PageLanguageStatus}.Status

variant.name: PageLanguageSupported
variant.summary: page whose client-assessed language is expected to be supported by Compose

variant.name: PageLanguageUnsupported
variant.summary: page whose client-assessed language is expected to be not supported by Compose (but usage was still allowed).

histogram.name: Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Session.CloseReason
histogram.summary: When a session ends, record how we exited the session, whether by accepting the input, canceling with the close button, or losing focus and not going back to the session. {ComposeEvalLocation} If a mix of Server and OnDevice requests were used for this session, neither Server or OnDevice variants are recorded.

histogram.name: Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Session.ComposeCount.{FinalStatus}
histogram.summary: Count of the number of Compose requests in a session where {FinalStatus}. Recorded once per session when it is closed or destroyed. {ComposeEvalLocation} If a mix of Server and OnDevice requests were used for this session, neither Server or OnDevice variants are recorded.

histogram.name: Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Session.DialogShownCount.{FinalStatus}
histogram.summary: Count of the number of times the main Compose dialog was shown in a session where {FinalStatus}. Is not recorded if the session never passed the FRE or MSBB disclaimers. Recorded once per session when it is closed or destroyed. {ComposeEvalLocation} If a mix of Server and OnDevice requests were used for this session, or no requests were made, then neither Server nor OnDevice variant is recorded.

histogram.name: Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Session.Duration.{SessionType}
histogram.summary: The length of a ComposeSession in ms that end {SessionType}. Recorded once per session when the session closes for any reason. {ComposeEvalLocation} If a mix of Server and OnDevice requests were used for this session, or no requests were made, then neither Server nor OnDevice variant is recorded.

histogram.name: Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Session.EventCounts
histogram.summary:
Enumerated histogram that records counts for events that happen during a Compose Session. This histogram answers the question: How many sessions had each event type. Even if an event occurs multiple times in a session only one event is recorded Dialog Shown will be the number of sessions and should be used as the denominator for all values.
All buckets are emitted once at the end of each Compose Session.
{ComposeEvalLocation} If a mix of Server and OnDevice requests were used for this session, neither Server or OnDevice variants are recorded.

histogram.name: Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Session.SubmitEditCount.{FinalStatus}
histogram.summary: Count of the number of Compose requests resulting from submitting an input edit in a session where {FinalStatus}. Recorded once per session when it is closed or destroyed. {ComposeEvalLocation} If a mix of Server and OnDevice requests were used for this session, neither Server or OnDevice variants are recorded.

histogram.name: Compose.{ComposeEvalLocation}Session.UndoCount.{FinalStatus}
histogram.summary: Count of the number of times undo is done in a session where {FinalStatus}. Recorded once per session when it is closed or destroyed. {ComposeEvalLocation} If a mix of Server and OnDevice requests were used for this session, neither Server or OnDevice variants are recorded.
